details.title: An Automatic Data Processing System for Laser Anemometers
details.abstract: An automatic data processing system for the evaluation of statistically occurring Doppler-difference bursts is described. In addition to the higher accuracy compared with the data acquisition procedures known so far, this technique allows the Doppler-difference method to be used as an operational instrument for investigations into turbulent flows, especially in the case of low particle density and extremely small turbulence degrees.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
